name: RPG Legends Gallery
description:
Have you ever wanted to fight against iconic RPG characters? The likes of Cloud Strife and Sephiroth from FINAL FANTASY VII, Olberic from Octopath Traveler , or Lucas from Mother 3? Now you can! In RPG Legends Gallery, you take on the role of Bobby as he fights against multiple RPG legends, making his way to the keeper of the dungeon.

*Game may receive updates adding more RPG characters.
